taskbody.context: To create a new Design Studio (DS) project:

step.cmd:
On the menu bar, click
File Project
.
step.stepresult: The New Project dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd:
Select
Design Studio Design Studio Template Project
.
step.stepresult: The New Design Studio Template Project dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: From the drop down list, select the kind of template you want to create in your workspace.
Enter the template parameters if any.
Click Finish to create the project()s).
step.stepresult: Your new DS projects are displayed in the Project Explorer view.
